narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 Focused inspection on the direct and indirect veterinary care citations.
The attending veterinarian has examined the camel and 2 aoudads and started a treatment plan. 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative by Katherine Campbell ACI and Dr. Ellen Magid SACS.
